name: Energy (Paepti)
description:
This one-button-game was created for the One Game A Week seminar. This is the first project.

Game Description:

Work as many hours as you can before your energy runs out.

Key Features:

In this one-button-game you play with the SPACE key only..!

Credits: Me. Paepti. :) 

----

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. Supervised by: Lena Falkenhagen
